commit message: Removed old, unused activities from manifest
Change username to email in login

Fixed logout site list error

When a use logged out of a private site and was redirected to the site list
activity, the list wasn't repopulated and the APIService was throughing an
exception.  This was because the main Site object was still set to the private
site, which the app was no longer able to retrieve sites from that endpoint.
Setting the site to NULL on logout fixed this.

Once we make the Login changes we've been talking about, this change will
*hopefully* no longer be necessary.

Export required libraries.

This fixes a VerifyError.
Start of using otto for API results.
Add APIService.call() to handle api calls
APIService: Call opens a login dialog if needed.
Add missing bus register calls in Fragments.
Perform API calls after logging in.

Inflate menu in IfixitActivity

Now each Activity doesn't have to explicitly do it. This is still a
WIP - we still need flags to be able to disable some of the menu
items.
Hide Gallery menu button in GalleryActivity
Automatically finish Activities if logged out
Keep the options menu updated with login changes
Exit Dozuki site if the user has logged out

Remove singleTop from TopicsActivity

And also fix Lint warning regarding backups.
Clear pending api call on cancelLogin

Fix definitions of force public

It previously worked but the values and uses were flipped.
Set the current user when changing sites

Make TopicsActivity be singleTop

Turns out it is needed for SiteListActivity because the Activities in
the manifest get switched around by dozukify.sh.

Fix OpenID login

We don't want to finish() the Activity if we're in the middle of
logging in. Also super.onActivityResult() must be called so it will
be passed along to Fragments.

Fix finishing activities on login cancel.

Turns out the mIsLoggingIn flag isn't reset soon enough if it is in
LoginFragment onDestroy so I moved it to MainApplication.cancelLogin.
Gallery: Only show login text when logged in
Gallery: Hide menu icons if logged out
Gallery: Hide no images text if logged out

Remove layout-large gallery_view layout

The only difference was put into dimens.xml.
Gallery: fix no images text displaying
Don't display the login dialog twice

Remove unused resources.

The resources were found by this project:
http://code.google.com/p/android-unused-resources/

Fix Login/Register fragment interactions

The login and register fragments now behave reasonably when
cancelling, hitting back, and successfully authenticating.
Gallery: Keep no images text updated

Gallery: Fix image chooser

The case statement was accidentally removed.
Gallery: Fix no images text on register
Class documentation for LoginEvent and LogoutDialog

Split GalleryActivity into Activity + Fragment

Eventually there will be separate Fragments for videos, images, and
embeds so we might as well have it like this for now.

Upgrade HoloEverywhere

This fixes a bug that caused duplicate options menu icons being
displayed.

Fix hardware search button

This was not tested after we added the site list dialog and as a
result it opened a dialog view rather than focussing on the
searchview widget.

Fix hardware menu button

This fixes some null pointer exceptions when hitting the hardware
menu button when those icons don't exist.

Move logout button to overflow

Logout isn't that important so it should be tucked away in the
overflow menu.
Hide yahoo login option since it doesn't work

Gracefully handle failed SSO logi

Conflicts:

App/src/com/dozuki/ifixit/login/ui/LoginFragment.java
